page.title: 20ASIAN INFLUENCE
page.content: There are many{Asian families}in our area. We are{Moslem.}We wear different clothes. I wear a colourful tunic called a{Kameez}over silk trousers called{Salwar}which are tight round the ankle. Girls over{12}years of age must not show their legs so they can- not wear dresses and they must wear a {headscarf.}They must never go anywhere with a boy they do not know. We eat different foods like{chapatties, curry and{savoury rice.}For{sweet dishes}we have{sweet rice}or{Mety.}At school we do not eat meat, because it has not been killed the Moslem way. We study the{Koran}and pray to{Allah}five times a day. My{father}is a{teacher}in our local{Mosque.}In{June}we{fast}for{30} {days}from{sunrise}to{sunset}in celebration of our{festival}of{Eid.} This is a{holiday}for us when we{visit our{friends}and{relations. }
